titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives with regard to the United States National Soccer Team and its historic performance in the 2002 FIFA World Cup tournament.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.
Mr. Watts (OK) asked unanimous consent to discharge from committee and consider.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 6/26/2002--Passed House without amendment. Congratulates the coach and players on the United States National Soccer Team for their historic performance in the 2002 FIFA World Cup tournament. Commends the U.S. Soccer Federation and coaches and parents of young soccer players around the country for their role in the success of soccer in the United States.
